title: Блюстители порока
overview: The Russian filmmakers dedicated their thriller to the memory of the outstanding director Alfred Hitchcock. In each episode, the "Master of Horror" will reveal one of his professional secrets. The series uses the plots of the classic's stories. With his inherent desire to understand all the shades of fear, all the degrees of horror, all the flavors of a nightmare. Each film is a complete story with a stunning detective intrigue.
